Method Detail

encryptOTP

public static java.lang.String encryptOTP(java.lang.String plaintext,
                                          java.lang.String key)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Encrypts with the One time pad method

Parameters:
plaintext - the text to be encrypted
key - the key with which the plaintext will be encrypted
Returns:
an encrypted version of the provided plaintext
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - for not provided an equal length plaintext and key

alphaNumericLength

private static int alphaNumericLength(java.lang.String s)
Parameters:
s - String to check
Returns:
the number of alpha-numeric characters

decryptOTP

public static java.lang.String decryptOTP(java.lang.String cyphertext,
                                          java.lang.String key)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Decrypts a one time pad cypher

Parameters:
cyphertext - the cyphertext to be decrypted
key - the key necessary to decrypt the cyphertext
Returns:
a decrypted version of the provided cyphertext
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - for not providing an equal length cyphertext and key

rot13

public static java.lang.String rot13(java.lang.String text)
The standard online ROT13 encryption (for letters, and ROT5 for numbers)

Parameters:
text - the string to be encrypted
Returns:
an encrypted version of the provided text string

indexOf

private static int indexOf(char[] charArr,
                           char letter)
returns the index of a certain character in a specified array.

Parameters:
charArr - the array to be searched
letter - the character to search for
Returns:
the index of the specific char in the array or -1 if not in the array
